evidence.claim: AX for Pharma utilizes AWS for cloud services to enhance their healthcare solutions.
The company supports interoperability through FHIR standards for EHR systems.
AX for Pharma implements HIPAA-compliance in their data handling practices.
They integrate with various EHRs using HL7 messaging protocols.
Azure is mentioned as part of their cloud infrastructure for scalability.

icp.icp_reason: No explicit evidence found on public pages for X12 or clearinghouse use cases.
